subject: Tennis
Indecency, Obscenity and Profanity
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Tennis’s foul-mouthed tradition is now firmly entrenched, but cracking down on the offenders may not matter as much as it once did.
snippet: Tennis’s foul-mouthed tradition is now firmly entrenched, but cracking down on the offenders may not matter as much as it once did.
